transcript.text:
￼














Products


Product Actions
Mask Image

3 min
purpose it is advisable to upload a mask image of the die cut products these files differentiate the printable as well as the non printable area of the product also, these images give the exact position to design and help the customer create a better design when a customer chooses to personalize such a product using the custom design option, the designer studio will show the mask image instead of a blank canvas thus, your customer can easily design the printable area, keeping in mind the non printable area shown in the picture is the mask image of the cd product learn to create mask images from here https //docs onprintshop com/third party integrations/product mask image creation note upload gif, png, or pdf files only upload images of the same file type for both portrait and landscape orientation add mask image to add a mask image, click on the ‘ add ’ button product size select the product size page name select the page name upload files upload the mask image files you can upload a separate mask image for print ready files or directly upload print ready files svg path as an alternative, you can directly enter the svg path for product mask image once done, click on save and continue
Did this page help you?
